Slogan: Ask thousands of people within seconds!
Bloc1Text1: No need to create an account to use the app.
Bloc1Text2: You can view surveys, results, and even vote without logging in!
Bloc2Text1: Create surveys in a few clicks and share them with your friends or the whole world.
Bloc2Text2: You can view real-time results and make decisions in seconds!
Bloc3Text1: Browse popular surveys and vote for your favorite answers.
Bloc3Text2: See real-time results and compare your choices with other users!
